Authors:
Toshimitsu FUKIHARU, Thao Phuong Nguyen, Kiminori
SHIMIZU
Title:
Parasola neoplocatilis sp. nov. (Agaricales, Basidoomycota)
from Chiba and Toyama, central Japan.
Abstract:
Parasola neoplicatilis (Basidiomycota, Agaricales,
Psathyrellaceae) described as a new coprinoid fungus from Chiba and
Toyama pref., Japan. In macro- and micro-morphology, this species is
similar to P. kuehneri but differs in basidiospore morphology; shape is
more rhomboid or mitriform and also rostrated at base (around apiculus).
This distinct basidiospore shape differs this species from all other
Parasola species. The results of phylogenetic analysis with the ITS data
also support this new taxon.
